adjectives.description: viraginian (comparative more viraginian, superlative most viraginian)

entries.meaning: Of or pertaining to a virago; having the qualities of a virago.
examples: But does it not argue rather the lascivious promptness of his own fancy, who, from the harmless mention of a sleekstone, could neigh out the remembrance of his old conversation among the viraginian trollops?
